projects.title: Django Internet Speed Tester
projects.bodyText:
- Django Internet Speed Tester is a web application built with Django that allows users to test their internet speed.
- It provides functionalities to measure download and upload speeds as well as ping.

projects.title: Omil Staffing Solutions Website
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a responsive website for Omil Staffing Solutions using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Designed with user-friendly navigation and modern UI/UX principles to enhance user experience.

projects.title: Tech Space Website
projects.bodyText:
- Collaborated in the development of the Tech Space website, contributing to front-end design and functionality.
- Utilized technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to create an engaging and informative platform for technology enthusiasts.

projects.title: Go Deliveries Figma Design
projects.bodyText:
- Designed the user interface for Go Deliveries mobile application using Figma.
- Incorporated intuitive navigation, clean layout, and modern design elements to optimize user experience and functionality.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a weather application using React Native and Expo, providing users with real-time weather updates and forecasts.
- Integrated with weather APIs to fetch accurate data and displayed results in a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Savanna Link E-Commerce (Django)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Django e-commerce platform for Savanna Link, facilitating online shopping and order management.
- Implemented features such as user authentication, product catalog, and secure payment processing to enhance the e-commerce experience.

projects.title: React Native Login Form with Animation
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a login form with animated transitions using React Native, enhancing user interaction and visual appeal.
- Implemented smooth animations and transitions to create a seamless login experience for users.

projects.title: Flower Scanning App (React Native & Expo)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a flower scanning application using React Native and Expo, allowing users to identify flowers through image recognition.
- Integrated with machine learning models and camera functionalities to provide accurate flower identification.

projects.title: Al Salam Butcher App Design (Figma)
projects.bodyText:
- Designed the user interface for the Al Salam Butcher mobile application using Figma, focusing on intuitive navigation and seamless user experience.
- Incorporated modern design elements and branding guidelines to create a visually appealing and functional app design.

projects.title: Al Salam App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed the Al Salam Butcher mobile application, providing users with a convenient platform to browse products, place orders, and track deliveries.
- Implemented features such as user authentication, product catalog, and order management to streamline the shopping experience.

projects.title: Al Salam App Backend (Node.js)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed the backend infrastructure for the Al Salam Butcher mobile application using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
- Implemented RESTful APIs, database schema design, and user authentication to support the functionality of the mobile app.

projects.title: Daboka Saas System
projects.bodyText:
- Collaborated on the development of the Daboka Saas System, contributing to front-end and back-end features.
- Implemented scalable architecture, data management functionalities, and user interface enhancements to optimize the platform for users.
